title: Unauthorized Character Purchase
body: I recently logged into my account to find that most of my IP, that I had been saving up, had been spent on Akali. A short while later I got logged out with an error message saying that my account had been logged into on another computer. I immediately changed my password to prevent further harm. Is there any way to refund this purchase?

replies.body: Your best bet for getting unauthorized activity reversed is to hit us up through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). Reach out to us there and we'll be able to make sure your account is kept safe and that any unauthorized transactions are reversed.
Thanks, I'll get right on it!
